title: SpiteFest 2021, Pete Davidson Vs Mr Tobacco 12.8.20
itunes:title: SpiteFest 2021, Pete Davidson Vs Mr Tobacco 12.8.20
description:
In episode 774, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Like Mother podcast host Alison Stevenson to discuss Trump's White House exit, Kelly Loeffler's performance at the Georgia Senate debates, how Melbourne eradicated Covid-19, some Staten Island drama, the Havana attacks, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump mulling extravagant White House exit to upstage Biden inauguration: report
  2. Kelly Loeffler won't affirm the reality that Trump's loss wasn't rigged, but instead pivots to bashing socialism
  3. How Melbourne eradicated Covid-19
  4. The Staten Island Bar Manager Who Flouted COVID Restrictions Hit a Sheriff’s Deputy With His Car
  5. PETE DAVIDSON RIPPED BY STATEN ISLAND LOCALS ... For Defiant Bar Jokes on 'SNL'
  6. Report Points to Microwave ‘Attack’ as Likely Source of Mystery Illnesses That Hit Diplomats and Spies
  7. Microwave Radiation 'Most Plausible' Cause Of Diplomats' Ailments, Report Says
  8. WATCH: Scuti - Skoowup (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
